data.title: EMS Namboodiripad: A Revolutionary Life - The People's Forum
data.meta_description: Join us for a presentation on the life of prolific Marxist thinker EMS Namboodiripad, in his historical and political context.
data.text:
EMS Namboodiripad (1909-1998) was a leader of the communist movement in India, former Chief Minister of Kerala, and a founder of the Communist Party of India (Marxist). He was a prolific writer, whose insights on Marxist theory, the international communist movement, caste, womenâ€™s struggle, and national liberation, continue to shape theoretical debates and practical activity in our day. This presentation will introduce his life, in its historical and political context.

This event is co-hosted by 1804 Books, Tricontinental Institute, and LeftWord Books.
